document_data.name: Tanya bint Perijan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tanya bint Perijan''' was one of [[Grand Caliph]] [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]]'s favorite wives.

Her dowry for her engagement to the Grand Caliph was a staggering 500,000 ''[[dinar]]s'', instantly propelling her [[House of Al-Danafi|family]] to prominent status among the elite of [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Description: Still in her early 20s, Tanya was young and stunningly beautiful. She had rich sable hair and dark eyes that she accented further with [[kohl]]. Her favorite color was yellow, and she often wore garments and gold jewelry of this color. Her hands and feet were dyed with henna.
document_data.Personality: Tanya was an opportunist and constantly thirsted for power, though she remained devoted to her husband.
document_data.Possessions: Tanya had only but to ask to receive just about anything one could imagine, but she was known to always have in her possession a ''[[ring of protection|ring of protection +3]]'', a ''[[ring of invisibility]]'', a ''[[scarab of deception]]'', a ''[[dagger|dagger +2]]'', ''[[oil of attractiveness]]'', and a ''[[philter of love]]''.
document_data.Activities: As Khalil's favored wife, Tanya ruled the other wives and concubines of the Royal Harim through friendship, bribery, or blackmail.
document_data.Relationships:
Tanya was the daughter of [[Perijan al-Danaf|Perijan]] and [[Khwaja al-Danaf|Khwaja]], both members of a powerful trading family based out of [[Gana]] in the [[Pearl Cities]].

She had two daughters with her husband, [[Janya bint Khalil|Janya]] and [[Dalia bint Khalil|Dalia]].
